## Introduction

Data storage has come a long way since thumb drives and external hard drives came into existence. Today, cloud storage is the most popular method of data storage. Degoo is a cloud storage software that stands out from other cloud storage software. With Degoo, data is automatically backed up and secure.

## What is Degoo?

Degoo is a cloud storage software that provides secure cloud storage for all types of files. Unlike other cloud storage providers, Degoo offers an extensive amount of free storage space to users.

Degoo’s secure cloud storage delivers peace of mind to users who are concerned about their data’s security. With AES-256 encryption, your files are safe both on your device and on Degoo's servers.

## Features of Degoo

Degoo offers several unique features that separate it from other cloud storage software. 

### Free Storage

For starters, Degoo offers up to 100GB of free storage space to its users. This generous offering is unmatched by other cloud storage providers.

### Automatic Backup

Degoo also provides an automatic backup feature that regularly backs up your files. This ensures that your data is always safe and up-to-date.

### Multiple Device Syncing

With Degoo, you can sync your files across multiple devices. This means that you can access your files from any device, anywhere, and at any time.

### Sharing

Degoo also allows users to share their files with others. Sharing files doesn’t come at the expense of security. With Degoo, you can share files securely without having to worry about unauthorized access.

## Why Choose Degoo?

Degoo is the best choice for anyone looking for a cloud storage software that provides reliable, secure, and easy-to-use data storage. Degoo offers features such as automatic backup and sharing that bring a whole new level of convenience to cloud storage.

Degoo is also beneficial because it makes data storage more affordable. Its generous offering of 100GB of free storage space is unmatched by other cloud storage providers. Additionally, Degoo’s pricing plans are affordable and won’t break the bank.

## Conclusion

Degoo is the best cloud storage software for data backup. With its automatic backup feature, 100GB of free storage space, and AES-256 encryption, Degoo offers secure and reliable cloud storage. Its easy-to-use interface, multiple device syncing, and sharing features make it a convenient choice for all types of users. Choose Degoo for secure and hassle-free cloud storage.
